short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tinyflux is a notifier browser extension for Miniflux.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TinyFlux is a small, lightweight Miniflux client that allows users to easily read their subscriptions within the context of their web browser. It features a clean and minimalistic interface, making it easy to navigate and use.

This is a open source browser extension client for Miniflux. You will need a Miniflux instance, either a public one such as https://reader.miniflux.app/ or your own https://github.com/miniflux/v2.

Source code: https://github.com/jlsalvador/tinyflux
